title: 109_s1862
content: United States-Israel Energy Cooperation Act - Instructs the Secretary of Energy, in implementing the Agreement between the Department of Energy of the United States of America and the Ministry of Energy and Infrastructure of Israel Concerning Energy Cooperation, to establish a grant program to support research, development, and commercialization of alternative renewable energy sources. Authorizes grants to promote the following: (1) solar energy, (2) biomass energy, (3) energy efficiency, (4) wind energy. And (5) fossil energy. Directs the Secretary to establish an advisory board to: (1) monitor how such grants are awarded. And (2) provide periodic performance reviews of actions taken to carry out the grant program.
